h2_title: Yin Tiger Fight and Transformation Spell: Ebon Flow
content: Not only does unlocking Zodiac Village introduce the Yin Tiger and the ability to upgrade armor, you can also challenge him to a duel. Doing so will reward you with a new armor set to craft, a new curio slot, and the Ebon Flow Transformation Spell.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Yin Tiger Fight and Transformation Spell: Ebon Flow'.
The content is as follows:
Not only does unlocking Zodiac Village introduce the Yin Tiger and the ability to upgrade armor, you can also challenge him to a duel. Doing so will reward you with a new armor set to craft, a new curio slot, and the Ebon Flow Transformation Spell.
